docs.text: Welcome to the homepage of Weitian Xing I am currently a 1st-term MASc student in the department of Electrical and Computer Engineering at University of Waterloo , my advisor is Prof. Werner Dietl . Find me at: Github / Linkedin Education From January to April 2019, I was a MEng student in the department of Electrical and Computer Engineering at University of Waterloo . From September to December 2018, I was a MEng student in the department of Systems Design Engineering at University of Waterloo . From September 2014 to June 2018, I studied in the department of Electronic Information Science and Technology and received my B.S. from Nanjing University of Posts and Telecommunications . Research Interest I am currently working on pluggable type systems. Industry Experience From April to June 2018, I interned at Nanjing Guiji Zhineng Technology Co., Ltd. as a Python R&D Engineer. From October 2017 to January 2018, I interned at Nanjing Walkyren Network Technology Co., Ltd. as a Backend Developer. Projects New-Airbnb : A rental website that mimics airbnb. ASR-Backend : The backend service of ASR engine. Dianping-Crawler : A crawler of dianping.com. Q&A-Robot : A Q&A robot for pre-sale advice. Click here to see a complete list of projects. Contact Me Click here to see the contact information.

docs.title: Contact Information

docs.text: Projects Here is a list of projects that I used to participate in. Unfortunately, I cannot provide the code or any details for the company projects. New-Airbnb Type : 2019 Winter ECE651 Project Introduction : New-Airbnb is a website that mimics and achieves the main functions of airbnb. Technical Stack : Python, Django, MongoDB, Heroku. Contribution : Implemented and maintained the backend of the website, cooperated with Jiangqi Zhang . Find it at : Github . ASR-Backend Type : Company Project Introduction : ASR-Backend is the backend service for an ASR engine. Technical Stack : Python, Tornado, Paddle-Paddle. Contribution : Developed the backend service. Using coroutines to implement asynchronous. Dianping-Crawler Type : Company Project Introduction : Dianping-Crawler is a crawler for dianping.com. Technical Stack : Python, RabbitMQ, MongoDB, Docker. Contribution : Designed and maintained the crawler. Using RabbitMQ as the message queue to send tasks, MongoDB to store the information of stores. Q&A-Robot Type : Company Project Introduction : Q&A-Robot is a widget for pre-sales advice. Technical Stack : Python, Flask, TuringAPI. Contribution : By using the Jieba text segmentation and turing api, I implemented a Q&A robot api to talk with the customers. To be released.
